<title level="1" right="Rules">[Using Ley Lines](/Rules.aspx?ID=1535)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 215 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
While locating a ley line might be a difficult process, making use of a ley line's power is remarkably simple. Accessing the power of a ley line requires using the  <%SKILLS.GENERAL%7%%> Tap Ley Line <%END> general skill action. The results of this action are based on the benefits and drawbacks of a ley line.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
